name: Farm Line - Garden Mania Story2
description:
Here comes the most juicy fruit match-3 game. Swap to match 3 or more succulent blueberries, Granny Smith, fresh strawberries and appetizing grapes in Farm Line - Garden Mania Story2. Set out for an impressive fruits blasting journey in Farm Line - Garden Mania Story2!
Farm Line - Garden Mania Story2 Features:
+ Many challenging levels & many game props
+ Many Challenging Modes in each level.
+ Scrumptious, Delicious and juicy fruit combo
+ Rich Decor graphics that will leave you hungry for more
+ Easy and fun to play, challenging to master
+ Hundreds of sweet levels in the sweet recipe
